title: MD2TXT - Markdown to Text Converter
description: Convert Markdown format to plain text online

instructions.title: How to Use
steps: Enter or paste your Markdown text in the input area
Click the 'Convert' button to transform it to plain text
The converted text will appear in the output area
Click the 'Copy' button to copy the result to your clipboard

websiteDescription.title: About MD2TXT
websiteDescription.content:
MD2TXT is a simple and easy-to-use online tool that converts Markdown formatted text to plain text. It supports real-time conversion, allowing you to see the results immediately. Key features include:

1. Real-time Markdown to plain text conversion
2. Copy converted text with one click
3. Support for Chinese and English interface switching
4. Clean and intuitive user interface

How to use:
1. Enter or paste Markdown text in the input box
2. The conversion result will be displayed in real-time in the output box
3. Click the copy button to copy the converted text
4. Use the clear button to reset input and output
